channel.title: !barrows chest help--make it so u need 5 kills for reward!

item.title: !barrows chest help--make it so u need 5 kills for reward!
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:8, topic:306751”][quote author=syracusepker94 link=topic=402939.msg2984695#msg2984695 date=1254882585]
figured it out

instead of doing || karils == 0 etc…

i had to do

&& karils == 0

etc etc

woot 1 week of coding experience ftw
[/quote]

Remember; && means and, || means or.[/quote]

thanks for the tip. wish i new that 2 hours ago lol

Read full topic
item.source: !barrows chest help--make it so u need 5 kills for reward!

item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

haha it works!

in npc handler
it was temp.karil = 1 instead of temp.Karils = 1

a capital letter and an “s”…

item.title: !barrows chest help--make it so u need 5 kills for reward!
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

you can just click my barrows chest and get a reward without needing kills. heres what i got so far for the chest

}
if(objectID == 10284 || Karils == 1 || verac == 1 || dharok == 1 || guthan == 1 || ahrim == 1 || torag == 1){
Karils = 0;
ahrim = 0;
dharok = 0;
verac = 0;
torag = 0;
guthan = 0;
addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 2);
addItem(4740, misc.random(100));
addItem(560, misc.random(100));
addItem(558, misc.random(100));
addItem(565, misc.random(100));
sM("You search the chest and find some items!");
}
else if (objectID == 10284 || Karils == 0 || verac == 0 || dharok == 0 || guthan == 0 || ahrim == 0 || torag == 0){
sM("You need to kill the 5 brothers first!");
}

Read full topic
item.source: !barrows chest help--make it so u need 5 kills for reward!
